name: Knowt
description: Knowt is an AI-powered study platform offering free tools like flashcards and quizzes to enhance student learning.
longDescription: Knowt is an innovative educational platform designed to help students and teachers study more efficiently using AI-driven tools. It serves as a free alternative to Quizlet, allowing users to create, import, or study flashcards, notes, and practice quizzes across various subjects. The platform’s AI assistant, Kai, transforms lecture videos, PDFs, and notes into personalized study materials, saving time and improving retention. With over 5 million users, Knowt supports academic success by offering accessible, collaborative, and interactive learning resources. Its mission is to empower students by eliminating inefficiencies in traditional study methods, making learning faster and more effective.
features: Free Learn Mode allows unlimited study sessions with flashcards, enabling students to master material without cost.
AI Flashcard Generation creates interactive flashcards from PDFs, videos, or notes, streamlining study preparation.
Quizlet Import enables users to transfer existing Quizlet sets to Knowt with one click for free studying.
Spaced Repetition uses a scientifically backed algorithm to optimize flashcard review schedules for better retention.
Practice Test Mode simulates exams with customizable question types, helping students prepare effectively.
AI Note-Taking summarizes lecture videos and documents, reducing manual effort and enhancing study efficiency.
Collaborative Study Groups foster peer learning by allowing students to share resources and study together.
Multi-Platform Sync ensures seamless access to study materials across mobile apps and the website.

faqs.question: Is Knowt completely free to use?
faqs.answer: Knowt offers a robust free plan with unlimited access to core features like Learn Mode and Quizlet imports, though some advanced features may require a paid subscription.

faqs.question: How does Knowt’s AI assistant, Kai, work?
faqs.answer: Kai analyzes uploaded content like PDFs, videos, or notes to generate flashcards, summaries, and quizzes tailored to the user’s study needs.

faqs.question: Can I import my Quizlet sets to Knowt?
faqs.answer: Yes, Knowt allows users to import Quizlet sets with a single click, enabling free studying with existing materials.

faqs.question: What study modes does Knowt offer?
faqs.answer: Knowt provides Learn Mode, Spaced Repetition, Practice Test Mode, and Matching Game to suit different learning styles.

faqs.question: Is Knowt suitable for teachers?
faqs.answer: Teachers can use Knowt to create quizzes, share resources, and manage student progress, with privacy-compliant features for schools.

faqs.question: Does Knowt work on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Knowt’s mobile app for iOS and Android syncs with the website, allowing seamless studying on the go.

faqs.question: Can I create my own flashcards on Knowt?
faqs.answer: Users can manually create flashcards or use AI to generate them from notes, videos, or other materials.

faqs.question: How does Knowt ensure data privacy?
faqs.answer: Knowt complies with privacy guidelines, using secure data practices and offering clear policies at knowt.com/privacy.
